2164.subject: MLML
2164.descrlong:
MLML 231:Bio Of Seaweeds-  Discussions on marine macroalgal biology with extensive reading of original literature. Ecologically oriented individual research projects involving laboratory culture and field experimentation. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact SEP program office for MLML registration procedures.

(Prereq: Exclude First Time Freshman and Freshmen and Sophomore and Junior)
